analysis.description:
NFTokenMetadata.nftName (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#1195-1196) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- name (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#1278-1282)

NFTokenMetadata.nftSymbol (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#1196-1197) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- symbol (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#1286-1287)

Xcert.nftConventionId (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#1312) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- conventionId (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#1409-1417)
AddressUtils.isContract (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#408-429) is declared view but contains assembly code

ERC721 (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#142-311) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#251-253)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#265-266)

NFToken (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#501-965) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#712-728)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#733-747)
tokens in ZxcCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#2189) is a local variable never initialiazed

Reentrancy in ZxcCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#2187-2206):
	External calls:
	- balance = xcertKyc.balanceOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#2191-2195)
	- tokenId = xcertKyc.tokenOfOwnerByIndex(msg.sender,balance.sub(1)) (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#2200)
	- kycLevel = uint256(xcertKyc.tokenDataValue(tokenId,0)) (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#2201-2205)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- zxcSold (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol)

Reentrancy in ZxcCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#2095-2184):
	External calls:
	- _tokenDecimals = token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#2133-2134)

	External calls:
	- _tokenDecimals = token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#2133-2134)
	- require(bool)(token.totalSupply() >= _crowdSaleZxcSupply) (/unique_chucks/11/0x04986b3ea83b0f5d628e216f77f03cb691f5c3dd.sol#2163-2164)
